metadata.title: CVE-2024-23848 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel through 6.7.1, there is a use-after-free incec_queue_msg_fh, related to drivers/media/cec/core/cec-adap.c anddrivers/media/cec/core/cec-api.c.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.8.0-45.45').
